body:
#### PR description:

Update some of the test scripts in Validation/HGCalValidation/test/python using a new tool that finds the right ERA and Global Tag

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

title: Phase2-hgx361A Update some of the test scripts in Validation/HGCalValidation/test/python using a new tool that finds the right ERA and Global Tag
